summary: Completed comprehensive testing of 'The Barbour Connection' family tree app. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend loads correctly with proper branding and navigation. Minor UI interaction issue with dropdown selection in modals.

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown options not clickable in modal overlays

passed_tests: Landing page loads with correct 'The Barbour Connection' branding
Dashboard displays after login with correct user info
Navigation between Dashboard, Members, and Calendar pages
Add member modal opens and form fields work
Add event modal opens and form fields work
All backend API endpoints (20/20 tests passed)
Footer displays correct admin (Samantha Smith) and developer (Derrick Mitchell) info
Oak tree design background with wood textures
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix dropdown selection issue in modals - dropdown options are not clickable when inside modal overlays. This affects both member and event creation forms.
